code: import{STORIES_ADD,STORIES_FETCH_ERROR}from"../constants/actionTypes";var INITIAL_STATE={stories:[],error:null};var applyAddStories=function applyAddStories(state,action){return{stories:action.stories,error:null};};var applyFetchErrorStories=function applyFetchErrorStories(state,action){return{stories:[],error:action.error};};function storyReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:INITIAL_STATE;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case STORIES_ADD:{return applyAddStories(state,action);}case STORIES_FETCH_ERROR:{return applyFetchErrorStories(state,action);}default:return state;}}export default storyReducer;
